title: France panorama. [No. 68/11]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items: 1. Carnival at Nice. 2. Incredible structures - Exposition showing plastic furniture. 3. Her and him - Portraits of Marielle Goitschel andJean-Claude Killy, Olympic ski champions. 4. Homage to Sonia Delaunay - French painter and co-founder of the Orphism art movement, aged 83. 5. Serge Reggiani - Italian-born French singer, painter and actor.
